---
title: Permits
---

## NOAA Protected Resources Permit

-   Review sightings/takes forms and record takes in the [Deployment Details](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/10bxlwfVOe1LFfj69B_YddxcA0V14m7codYwgD2YncFk/edit?usp=sharing) spreadsheet
-   Additional guidelines and information can be found in [the Protected Resources Permit](Additional%20guidelines%20and%20information%20can%20be%20found%20in%20the%20permit)

## NOAA Sanctuary Permit

-   Review the [SanctuarySummary spreadsheet from Driftwatch](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1PgwO3ewmHX0Z1d3q2BFrRz4fVvHuy1PXk_kQ-qX4sFs/edit#gid=9880775) and check for Sanctuary overlap
-   Record which sanctuaries the drift passed through in the Sanctuary Permit column in the [Deployment Details](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/10bxlwfVOe1LFfj69B_YddxcA0V14m7codYwgD2YncFk/edit?usp=sharing) spreadsheet
-   Additional guidelines and information can be found in [the Sanctuary Permit](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1zSX4WLbc_liQx5zCI8yhsr5csiAn0KA6/view?usp=sharing)

## Permit Spreadsheet

Record all other permit related information in the [Permit Spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1i2kCTgIBL9vXjiU1raGWcFhNhc6hI130RQYc41hUwBQ/edit#gid=0) including take numbers and sanctuary overlap
